metadata.title: CVE-2019-15890 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: libslirp 4.0.0, as used in QEMU 4.1.0, has a use-after-free in ip_reass inip_input.c.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
